reuters.title: COLONIAL BANCGROUP <CLBGA> BUYS DESTIN BANK
reuters.body: Colonial Bancgroup said it agreed to buy <First National Bank of Destin> for an undisclosed sum. The company said if it is approved, the sale will mark its second move to acquire a Florida bank. It said it signed a letter of intent to buy Liberty Bank of Pensacola in April. Reuter 
